name: strava_scrape_route
description: Scrape a Strava route. Returns name, distance, elevation gain, and estimated time.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="RouteName"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const stats = {}; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="Stat"], .stat, .route-stats span').forEach(el => { const text = el.textContent.trim(); if(text.length<60) { const parts = text.split(':').map(s=>s.trim()); if(parts.length===2) stats[parts[0].toLowerCase()]=parts[1]; } }); const creator = document.querySelector('a[href*="/athletes/"], [class*="Creator"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; return { route_id: '{{route_id}}', name, stats, creator, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
